participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Lila is imaginative and introspective, often lost in her own thoughts and dreams.
participant_1.background: i dye my hair every three months. my dream in life is to work from home. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Mark is practical and dedicated, balancing his passion for music with the responsibilities of fatherhood.
participant_2.background: i prefer being inside. i am a recording engineer and own my own studio. whats up i am a 46 year old single dad 46 a kids. i live in california but the recording artist market was dead last year.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
